title: Ensure Direct Mode is Enabled
steps: 1. From your computer, open the SteamVR app.
2. Click > Settings > Developer, and then make sure that Direct Mode is enabled.
3. Right-click the icon, and then click Reboot Vive headset.
4. Wait for the reboot process to complete.

title: Ensure Cables are Connected
steps: 1. Disconnect the 3-in-1 cable from the HMD.
2. Disconnect the 3-in-1 cable from the Link Box.
3. Disconnect the Link Box short cables from the PC.
4. Disconnect the short cables from the Link Box.
5. Reconnect all cables and ensure they are properly seated and connected to the correct ports.
